name: Enhanced Broadsword
effect: An artificial regalia based on a western-style sword with a wide blade.While [Equipped], once per round, the target of a [Physical Attack] gains -1 to their {Evade} check.

name: Enhanced Longsword
effect: A western sword converted into an artificial regalia.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Evade} check.

name: Reinforced New Sword
effect: A newly forged sword, upgraded to an artificial regalia.While [Equipped], once per round, when making a [Physical Attack], reduce the targets [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Bayonet

name: Unsigned Magic Sword

effect: A cone-shaped piercing dagger, purified with prayer and holy water. Skilled templar knights carry them as spare weapons.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Light], and when making a [Physical Attack], reduce the targets [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Enhanced Bastard Sword

name: Old Sword
effect: An old, unnamed sword with spiritual power that became a regalia.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +2 [Barrier].

name: Enhanced Flamberge
effect: **While [Equipped], once per combat, inflict [Shift: Pain] on a target that fails their {Evade} check.

effect: A western sword with an extremely long blade, converted into an artificial regalia.While [Equipped], once per combat, change the [Target] of an [Attack Action] to [Area].

name: Penetrating Rapier
effect: A rapier-type artificial regalia with enhanced penetration. Effective against opponents who have difficulty blocking the blade.While [Equipped], once per round when performing a [Physical Attack], reduce the targets [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Falcata
effect: A loosely curved single-edged sword used in carthage. Only the tip has a double blade, which is excellent for both slashing and piercing.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to the [Target] of a [Physical Attack].

name: Crystal Sword
effect: A single-edged sword made of a quartz-like mineral, found at an ancient archeological site in South America. It is transparent, and can inhibit the effects of magic.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Barrier]. Additionally, once per round, the target of a [Physical Attack] reduces their {Evade} check by 1.

name: Wind Blade Sword
effect: Usually a handle only, the blade of this sword extends at the will of the user.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Wind], and once per round, change the [Range] of a [Physical Attack] to 6 Sq.

name: Nomad
effect: A magic sword used in tranference ceremonies.While [Equipped], treat as though equipped with a [Magic Weapon], and once per round, targets that fail their {Evade} check may be moved up to 2 Sq away, ignoring [Engagements].

effect: A curved, single-edged sword with a wide blade used in the arts.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], reduce the target's [Armor] by 5 (Minimum 0).

effect: A dynamic sword boasting a full-fledged blade crest.While [Equipped], twice per combat, [Halve] the Target of a [Physical Attack]'s [Armor].

By filling it with spirit power, the user can create images of swords that attack an entire area.While [Equipped], once per round when making a [Physical Attack], change the [Target] of the [Physical Attack] to [Area].

effect: Light and mobile guards for hands and feet. Preferred by skilled explorers.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per session, gain +1 when rolling for [Materials].

name: Martial Arts Cane
effect: An artificial regalia used in kenpo. Unlike a six-shaku bo, it has been modified for combat.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Tactical Gloves
effect: Durable military gloves made of the hide of a magic beast. Loved by members who excel in hand to hand combat.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per combat, the target of a [Physical Attack] [Halves] their [Armor].

name: Lightning Tail
effect: A morningstar with three special iron alloy heads. It emits a powerul eletric shock when infused with spirit energy.While [Equipped] bestow [Element: Shock] to [Physical Attacks], and reduce the target of a [Physical Attacks] [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Leiomano
effect: A club-type artificial regalia with an oval wooden head ringed with shark's teeth. Very powerful, contrary to its appearance.While [Equipped], once per combat when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Flame Bash
effect: A sledgehammer artificial regalia with a rune of fire engraved on the head.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Barrier]. Additionally, reduce [Element: Fire - Cold] [Damage] by 10.

name: Swordsmasters Bokken
effect: A wooden sword made by a famous swordman and used as an artificial regalia.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], reduce the target's [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Bone Warhammer
effect: A warhammer artificial regalia made from the bones of ancient mononoke. It has tremendous spiritual power.While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of [Physical Attacks] by 1 Sq ([Engaged] becomes [2 Sq.], [2 Sq.] becomes [3 Sq.], etc).

name: Rose Staff
effect: A rare metal crucifix decorated with roses and a skull.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with a [Magic Weapon]. Additionally, once per combat, change [Physical Damage] to [Magical Damage] during [Damage Calculation].

name: Wargod's Tonfa
effect: A combat tonfa which has undergone advanced remodeling.While [Equipped], gain +3 [Armor]. Additionally, while [Equipped] alongside another weapon with "Tonfa" in its name, treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Kamui Baton
effect: A special baton-type artifact with powerful remodeling.While [Equipped], reduce the Target of a [Physical Attack]'s [Armor] by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Blast Fist
effect: A hand-made artificial regalia equipped with an explosive mechanism on the impact surface.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per combat while making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Earth Shaker
effect: A mallet-type artifact that creates strong vibrations when it strikes the ground.While [Equipped], once per combat when inflicting [Physical Damage], give [Shift: Fallen] to targets who take at least 1 point of [Damage].

name: Iron Maiden
effect: An artificial regalia composed of a chain attached to a torture device specialized for anti-Aramitama combat. Swing to use.While [Equipped], by spending x1 [Prep], change the [Range/Target] of [Physical Attacks] to [6 Sq / 1#] until [Timing: End] of the next round.

name: Sacred Tree
effect: A club made by compressing sacred trees. Excellent for obth offense and defense.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Grinding Zaghnal
effect: A tcombat pickaxe with both an ice pick head on one side and and axe-like head on the other.While [Equipped], the user may change [Physical Damage] to [Form: Axe]. Additionally, reduce the Target of a [Physical Attacks] [Armor] by 3 (Minimum 0).

name: Suitegetsu Staff
effect: A staff issued to those who excel at staff combat. By releasing the spirit power inside, it interferes with the opponents spiritual energy and hinders movement.While [Equipped], twice per combat, targets that fail their {Evade} checks gain [Shift: Pain].

name: Tenimuhou
effect: A thin woven glove made from the spirit fur of a beast, which does not impair spirit energy. It has no noteworthy effects, but does not break, stain, or deteriorate. There are many users within Heilong who are confident in their kung fu.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Arch Enemy
effect: An evil hand or foot inscribed with carvings of the devil's face. It is wrapped in spiritual light that has special effects.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, reduce [Damage] from [Class: Humanoid - Chaos] by 5.

name: Magic Chamber
effect: A hand-made artificial regalia for sorcerers. It has a hidden trigger function.While [Equipped], treat as though equipped with [Unarmed] and a [Magical Weapon]. Additionally, gain +10 [Magical Damage].

name: God's Warhammer
effect: A replica of the warhammer called by a variety of god names.While [Equipped], once per round, targets that fail their [Reactive Check] may be moved up to 2 Sq awat in any direction, ignoring [Engagements].

name: Castle Hammer
effect: A hammer-shaped artificial regalia that was forged to crush strongholds.While [Equipped], twice per round, destroy one [Obastacle] within [Range: 1 Sq.] that has 40 or less {HP}.

name: Macuahuitl
effect: An ancient hammer-type artificial regalia that uses obsidian blades embedded in a wooden club.While [Equipped], once per combar when performing a [Physical Attack], gain +2 [Physical Rank].

name: Tri-Element
effect: A knuckle-duster with jewels that bring forth the origins.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed]. Additionally, once per turn when performing a [Physical Attack], bestow one of [Element: Fire - Shock - Cold].

name: Wargod's Hammer
effect: A reproduction of the hammer used by the gods of war.May be thrown as a [Ranged Attack]. In this case, change the [Form / Range / Target] to [Ranged / {Strength} Sq. / 1#]. This weapon is not disabled after throwing.

name: Hangwire
effect: A combat-ready Artificial Regalia constructed from tiny, deadly wires. While [Equipped], [Physical Attacks] made with this weapon are treated as [Special Attacks].

name: Service Revolver
effect: An automatic revolver based on the S&W 356, turned into an Artificial Regalia. They are only provided to members of the Anti-Awakened groups that belong to Japan.While [Equipped], gain +5 to [Physical Damage] when performing a [Physical Attack] on non-[Boss] mononoke.

name: Black Pegasus
effect: An Alkeny-developed, stylish black racecar Artificial Regalia.While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves].

name: One Hand
effect: An elaborate prosthetic hand with a built-in firearm, manufactured by Shindo Katsutake. It features a transformation function.While [Equipped], gain +2 to {Strength} checks. Also, spend 1x [Prep] to change the [Target] of [Physical Attacks] to [Area] until after [Timing: End] of the current round.

name: Grenade Launcher
effect: Created based on the HK69, this grenade launcher is a powerful Artificial Regalia.While [Equipped], once per combat, inflict [Shift: Darkness] on [Targets] that took even one point of [Damage] from a [Physical Attack].

name: Burnout
effect: A flamethrower-type Artificial Regalia that can deal damage to wide areas. It uses special holy oil as fuel.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, once per round, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Cakraratna
effect: A metal throwing weapon shaped like a wheel, allegedly used by Nankobo Tenkai on his journey.While [Equipped], treat [Physical Attacks] as [Special Attacks]. Also, can be thrown as a [Ranged Weapon]. Throwing this [Weapon] does not render it unuseable.

name: Demon Blues
effect: An automatic handgun-type Artificial Regalia created using a Jericho 941 as a base.While [Equipped], once per combat, when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Rebellion
effect: An Artificial Regalia created from a Beretta 93R. It boasts a high firepower equivalent to a submachinegun due to its 3-round burst.While [Equipped], once per round, increase [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by 1#.

name: Legendary Warbow
effect: A large bow that was made into an Artificial Regalia. Made of thick metal, it is strung with a special fiber that needs spirit energy run through it to be drawn.While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Prep] when making an [Attack Action], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Sawn-Off
effect: An Artificial Regalia created from a sawn-off shotgun. Exceptional in close quarters combat.While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +1 to {Accuracy}. This [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Kaltherzig
effect: An automatic handgun-type Artificial Regalia created using a Sig Sauer as a base. It boasts high performance.While [Equipped], once per round, increase [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by 1#.

name: Etherboard
effect: A surfboard-type Artificial Regalia developed by the Black Eagle Group. It floats by drawing on an area's ambient spirit energy, drawing it in to use as propulsion.While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves].

name: John Smith
effect: An automatic handgun-type Artificial Regalia based on the M1911 series.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke / Godhunters] by +5.

name: O'will
effect: An intelligent, variable vehicle that travelled to earth from elsewhere.While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves]. Also, if you spend 1x [Start] timing, gain +1 to {Evasion} checks until after [Timing: End] of the current round.

name: Donner Schlag
effect: A versatile and easy-to-use Artificial Regalia used by the USP.While [Equipped], once per round, increase [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by 1#.

name: Violent Thread
effect: A combat-ready Artificial Regalia constructed from copper wires. It boasts unimaginable tension and can cut everything with its inherent spirit energy. While [Equipped], [Physical Attacks] made with this weapon are treated as [Special Attacks].

name: Mad Bull
effect: A large-bore, revolver-type Artificial Regalia based on the Raging Bull.While [Equipped], once per round, inflict [Shift: Fallen] on [Targets] that fail their {Evasion} check.

name: High Servant
effect: A combat-use Cursed Doll based on homonculus, which has been heavily modded. It is intelligent enough to carry messages, and can support its user by sharing its senses with them. While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor] and {Strength} checks. Also, gain [Sense: Magic].

name: Storm Cracker
effect: A heavily modified variant of the grenade launcher.While [Equipped], once per round, inflict [Shift: Fallen] on [Targets] that took even one point of [Damage] from a [Physical Attack].

name: Sterilizer
effect: An enhanced version of Burnout. The holy flames it emits scorch everything.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, once per round, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Spirit Halo
effect: A chakram-type Artificial Regalia that emits spiritual light from its blade. While [Equipped], treat as if [Unarmed]. Also, throwing this [Weapon] does not render it unuseable.

name: Undertaker
effect: A gun that fires sacred nails that can inhibit regeneration techniques.While [Equipped], once per combat, when performing a [Physical Attack], a [Target] that fails their [Reactive Check] gains a -20 modifier to [Recovery] until after [Timing: End] of the next round.

name: Wire Dagger
effect: A shuriken attached to a dagger-type Artificial Regalia via a thin wire.While [Equipped], once per combat, a [Target] that took at least one point of [Physical Damage] reduces the speed of their [Movement] by -2 squares.

name: Fury Road
effect: A more powerful version of the Sawn-Off. In addition to higher power, it boasts a longer range.While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +2 to {Accuracy}. This [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Repdigit Dice
effect: A dice-type Artificial Regalia that holds the spirit of gamblers.While [Equipped], once per round, when the total of an {Accuracy} roll is even (Before [Influence]), gain +2d6 to [Physical Damage]. Also, throwing this [Weapon] does not render it unusable.

name: Serial Dice
effect: A dice-type Artificial Regalia that holds the wit of gamblers.While [Equipped], once per round, when the total of an {Accuracy} roll is odd (Before [Influence]), gain +2d6 to [Physical Damage]. Also, throwing this [Weapon] does not render it unusable.

name: Vertrauen
effect: A high-performance automatic revolver based on the Kaltherzig. These pistols are very rare.While [Equipped], once per round, increase [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] by +1#.

name: Get Wild
effect: A high-performance, large-bore revolver-type Artificial Regalia manufactured based off of the Colt Python.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke / Godhunters] by +10.

name: Flame Dragon
effect: A high-performance assault rifle-style Artificial Regalia based on the latest-model M4 Carbine.While [Equipped], once per round, change the [Target] of the user's [Physical Attack] to [Area].

name: Potion Launcher
effect: An Artificial Regalia based on the Type-64 rifle, with a special underslung grenade launcher.While [Equipped], spend 1x [Timing: Prep] to use any [Item: Consumable] with [Range: 5 Sq. / Target: 1#].

name: Hero's Greatbow
effect: A replica of a greatbow used by ancient heroes, converted into an Artificial Regalia.While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Prep] when making an [Attack Action], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Red Griffon
effect: A high-performance motorcycle-type Artificial Regalia developed by Far East Heavy Industries.While [Equipped], user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Also, once per combat, gain +5 to [Initiative] until after [Timing: End] of the current round.

name: uardian Beast King
effect: A powerful beast that holds one of the highest ranks among bound steeds.While [Equipped], user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Also, once per round, change the [Range] of an [Attack Action] to [5 Sq.].

name: Silent Assassin
effect: A specialized longbow developed for assassination purposes. It contains a spirit jammer that reduces the amount of killing intent the user emits at the time of attack.While [Equipped], gain an additional +10 to [Damage Calculation] when under the effects of [Shift: Assault].

name: Scream
effect: A rocket launcher-type Artificial Regalia. This weapon is fully portable and used for Anti-Drone warfare.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack] on [Type: Mechanical], gain a +[1d6x5] modifier to [Damage Calculation]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Zwei Schutzen
effect: A special, handgun-type Artificial Regalia made from two large-caliber pistols connected together. Because of the stopping power of both guns, it hits with extreme force.While [Equipped], once per round, the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] that took [Damage] recieves [Shift: Fallen].

name: Disk Saucer
effect: A special Artificial Regalia that spins and launches consecrated circular sawblades.While [Equipped], once per round, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Water Splash
effect: A water cutter-type Artificial Regalia with special modifications. It blasts holy water at such a high pressure that it shears through physical objects.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Cold] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Stun Buster
effect: A special, howitzer-type Artificial Regalia that fires projectiles that explode in a cross shape.While [Equipped], targets that fail their {Evade} check may be moved up to 3 Sq away, ignoring [Engagements]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Enhanced Carbine
effect: A high durability, high performance Artificial Regalia based on the HK416 Carbine.While [Equipped], increase the [Target] of [Physical Attacks] by +2#.

name: Hydra Custom
effect: An extra-large revolver-type Artificial Regalia specially-made for Anti-Mononoke activities.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by +20.

name: Pile Cannon
effect: A powerful Pile Driver-type Artificial Regalia that can launch massive stakes at high speed.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], [Halve] the [Target]'s [Armor]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Kamui Greatbow
effect: A replica of a bow known in lore, made into an Artificial Regalia. Its power cannot be measured.While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Prep] or [Start] when making an [Attack Action], gain +1 [Rank].

name: High-Ranking Beast
effect: A divine beast that works in tandem with its contractor on the battlefield.While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves]. Also, once per round, change the [Range] of an [Attack Action] to [5 Sq.].

name: Hachikyukai
effect: An automatic rifle-type Artificial Regalia based on the Type-89 Rifle.While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Start], increase the [Target] of [Physical Attacks] by +2# until after [Timing: End] of the current round.

name: A.C.S
effect: *Prototype Powered Armor modified for personal use. Capable of changing between humanoid and multi-legged modes.While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor] and [Barrier]. Additionally, [A.C.S] can only be [Equipped] while the user is [Equipped] with [Restrict: Cyborg] [Armor].

name: Gamble
effect: Powerful, dice-type Artificial Regalia.While [Equipped], once per session, when an {Accuracy} roll is a [Fumble], change it to a [Critical] and gain +10 to [Physical Damage]. Also, throwing this [Weapon] does not render it unusable.

name: Coffin Arms
effect: A coffin-shaped Artificial Regalia packed with large firearms such as heavy machine guns and large-caliber howitzers.While [Equipped], change the [Target] of [Physical Attacks] to [Area]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Guardian Deity
effect: The strongest of Bound steeds and Heroic Spirits.While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves]. Also, once per round, gain +1 [Physical Rank] when performing a [Physical Attack].

name: Genocide Pledge
effect: A large-bore, revolver-type Artificial Regalia based on the Pfeifer Zeliska. It fires a unique Anti-God Nitro Express bullet.While [Equipped], when performing a [Physical Attack], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke ] by +20.

name: A.W.S
effect: A small missile pod-type Artificial Regalia equipped with an AEGIS system.While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] [Damage] received from [Targets] outside of [Range: Engaged].

name: Heavenly Arrow
effect: A kinetic weapon system that launches projectiles from a sattelite in orbit.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Magnet] to [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Halve] the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Fianna Dona
effect: A powerful rifle-type Artificial Regalia based on the Gebert series.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], [Halve] the [Target]'s [Armor]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Artillery System
effect: Artificial Regalia created from artillery-class cannons once mounted on tanks, battleships, combat aircraft, and more, modified to be man-portable.While [Equipped], gain +1 [Size]. Also, once per round, change the [Range] of a [Physical Attack] to [Area].

name: Daisuke Hachiman
effect: A large bow-type Artificial Regalia that bestows the protection of a war god.While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Immortal Banish
effect: A further modification of the Enhanced Carbine. It boasts the highest performance in the world.While [Equipped], increase the [Target] of [Physical Attacks] by +2#.

name: Daybreak
effect: A satellite-type Artificial Regalia equipped with an Anti-God beam cannon.While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Light] on [Physical Attacks]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Defense Smartphone
effect: *A smartphone-type Artificial Regalia with excellent portability. Defensive programs can protect its user in an instant.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +5 [Armor].

name: Magic Tablet
effect: A tablet-type Artificial Regalia that can access a database jointly-operatd by both organizations.While [Equipped], once per combat, spend 1x [Timing: Prep] and perform [Maneuver: Identify ({Intellect} Check)] on a [Range: Combat Zone / Target: 1#].

name: Mystic Arms
effect: A magical weapon-type Artificial Regalia. THey come in various forms such as canes, daggers, grimoires, and jewels.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1# to the [Target] of a [Magic Attack].

name: Exorcist Onusa
effect: A shinto paper wand that holds destructive power.While [Equipped], the [Range] of the user's [Magical Attacks] gets +2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 2 Sq.; if [Charge 2 Sq] it becomes [Charge 3 Sq]).

name: Artificial Eye
effect: An elaborate artificial eye developed by Sumizuka Pharmaceutical. In conjunction with nerves in the arm, the eye fires at predetermined times.While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Barrier] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Exorcist Staff
effect: A metal staff created via lost, ancient metalworking techniques. When filled with spirit energy, they emit a holy sound.While [Equipped], when making [Magic Attacks] against [Class: Undead - Chaos], gain +1 [Magical Rank].

name: Magic Mirror
effect: A mirror that possesses magic power.While [Equipped], increase [Magic Damage] against non-[Boss] [Godhunters] by +5.

name: Ghost Camera
effect: A camera-type Artificial Regalia that uses a mirror as a reflector. A dangerous and powerful magical weapon that saps the spirit energy of its target.While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Barrier] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Magic Revolver
effect: This is a large, revolver-type Artificial Regalia that can transform its user's spirit energy into bullets.While [Equipped], once per round, increase the [Target] of [Magical Attacks] by +1#.

name: Spirit-Sealing Stone
effect: This Jewel-type artificial regalia harbors a large amount of spirit energy.While [Equipped], the [Range] of the user's [Magical Attacks] gets +2 Sq. (If [Engaged], it becomes 2 Sq.; if [Charge 2 Sq] it becomes [Charge 3 Sq]).

name: Divine Weapon
effect: An artificial regalia that amplifies the power emitted from songs and scriptures. The form is variable, and can be anything from a sword to a book.While [Equipped], [Style: Divine Talker / Timing: Attack] [Talents] gain a +5 modifier at [Damage Calculation].

name: Magus Musket
effect: An old-fashioned musket-type Artificial Regalia. It uses bullet-type Artificial Regalia as ammunition.While [Equipped], once per combat, change the [Target] of a [Magic Attack] to [Area].

effect: A specially-enhanced spirit gun.While [Equipped], gain +1d6 [Damage] to the [Attack Actions] of a [Bound Primal].

name: Ghost Warrior
effect: A soul reinforced with a curse. Beautiful girl types are especially popular.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 [Magical Damage].

name: Spirit Missile
effect: A missile pod artifical regalia.While [Equipped], when performing a [Magical Attack] on [Class: Mechanical], gain +[1d6x5] [Magical Damage]. However, this [Weapon] may only be used to perform a [Magical Attack] once per round.

name: Malleus Maleficarum
effect: An old witch-hunting guide, which is an artificial regalia. Proof of the sins in the dark history of the church which must not be forgotten.While [Equipped], when making a making a [Magical Attack] against [Class: Humanoid / Chaos], gain +1 [Magical Rank].

name: Magician's Wand
effect: A wand-type artificial regalia used by orthodox magicians. It applies an invisible wall around the owner.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Armor].

name: Spirit Camera
effect: A camera that has the power to eat the soul itself from the subject.While [Equipped], once per round, the Target of a [Magical Attack] reduces [Barrier] by 5 (Minimum 0).

name: Book of Dzyan
effect: A historical book on pre-human civilization in ancient atlantis.While [Equipped], gain +3 to {Intellect} checks. Addtionally, once per combat, change one [Spirit Dice] to [Overflow].

name: Magic Broom
effect: A broom-type artifical regalia with combat enhancements.While [Equipped], user is able to make [Magical Attacks] even after a [Combat Move]. Additionally, once per round, the user may change the [Range] of a [Magical Attack] to [Charge 7 Sq].

name: Chronos Scissor
effect: A scissor-type artificial regalia remniscient of the short and long hands of a clock. The user can cut out a specific moment of space-time.While [Equipped], once per combat, [Range: 7 Sq. / Target: 1#] gains -2 to the result of a [Check].

name: Pioneer Staff
effect: A replica of the blessed staff given to those who continue to seek knowledge.While [Equipped], once per session, gain 1 [Overflow].

name: Ferryman's Lantern
effect: A lantern made up of a three-way handicraft that has been converted into an artificial regalia.While [Equipped], gain [Remove: Darkness]. Additionally, the user does not receive "dark place" penalties (Core p152).

name: Evil-Purging Onusa
effect: A poweful paper wand that exterminates evil. Somewhat difficult to handle.While [Equipped], when performing a [Magical Attack] against [Class: Undead / Chaos], gain +1 [Magical Rank].

name: Eight Million Gods Mirror
effect: A proof of friendship given by the three pillars of Nushi. It grants the blessing of the eight million gods.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Barrier], and +2 to {Luck} checks.

name: Legendary Contract Beast
effect: A legendary contracted summon told about in lore.While [Equipped], user may perform [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Additionally, once per round, change the [Range] of a [Magical Attack] to [Charge 5 Sq].

name: Assault Smartphone
effect: A powerful smartphone-type artificial regalia. Attack magic programs strengthen the owner.While [Equipped], once per combat while performing a [Magical Attack], the target [Halves] their [Barrier].

name: Ring of Spirit
effect: Multiple ring-type artificial regalia. Despite their small size, they have incredible performance.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1# to the [Target] of a [Magical Attack].

effect: A state of the art magic gun.While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with a [Restrict: Digital Sorcerer] [Item], and gain +1d6 [Damage] to the [Attack Actions] of a [Bound Primal].

name: Secret Scroll
effect: A replica of a scroll with secret oriental magic. An extremely powerful type of artificial regalia.While [Equipped], once per combat when performing a [Magical Attack], gain +2 [Magical Rank].

name: The Creator
effect: A handgun artificial regalia that creates obstacles.While [Equipped], by spending [Timing: Start], place one [Obstacle] equal to a [Large Boulder] within [Range: 7 Sq] in an unoccupied space.

name: The Detonator
effect: A handgun artificial regalia that destroys obstacles.While [Equipped], by spending x1 [Timing: Prep], destroy one [Obstacle] within [Range: 7 Sq], and [Target: 1#] adjacent to that [Obstacle] loses 2d6 {HP}.

name: Experienced Mascot
effect: A powerful mascot that survived many battles.While [Equipped], increase the [Range] of [Magical Attacks] by +2 ([Engaged] becomes [2 Sq.], [2 Sq.] becomes [3 Sq.], etc).

effect: A long wedge-shaped artificial regalia with a curse.While [Equipped], once per combat, Targets that take at least 1 point of [Magical Damage] reduce [Move Actions] by 2 (Minimum of 0) until [Timing: End] of the next round.

name: Cursed Jewel
effect: A cursed jewel artificial regalia. Extremely beautiful.While [Equipped], twice per round, gain +1# to the [Target] of [Magical Attacks].

name: Divine Booster
effect: A hand-made artificial regalia that amplifies spiritual power.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Damage] to [Style: Divine Talker / Timing: Attack] [Talents].

name: Skinbound Forbidden Book
effect: A manuscript within a magical book bound with the skin of sinners.While [Equipped], when performing a [Magical Attack] on [Class: Humanoid - Undead - Chaos], gain +1 [Magical Rank].

name: Fantasy Contract Beast
effect: One of the strongest class of contract summons which appears in myths.While [Equipped], user may make [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Additionally, once per round, change the [Range] of a [Magical Attack] to [Charge 7 Sq].

name: Golden Skull
effect: A golden skull, creates to imitate the main god of the Mandala cult.While [Equipped], once per combat when performing a [Magical Attack], the Target [Halves] their [Barrier].

name: Heroic Spirit Companion
effect: A soul bound to brotherhood through a strange destiny.While [Equipped], user may perform [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Additionally, once per round, change the [Target] of an [Attack Action] to [Area].

name: Master Manuscript
effect: A manuscript of a secret book written by a great magician.While [Equipped], once per session, change the [Cost] of a [Type: Arcane / Effect Class: Magical Attack] to [Steps].

name: Black Magic Key
effect: A sacred book written by Marquis De Gaita himself.While [Equipped], once per combat while performing a [Magical Attack] to [Target: 1#], gain +([Target]'s {Conjure} value) to [Magical Damage].

name: Archidoxen
effect: A secret alchemy script written by the founder of the Hohenheims.While [Equipped], twice per session by spending x1 [Timing: Prep], gain one [Item: Consumable / Cost: 300G or less].

name: Book of M
effect: A book of truths left behind by the founder of the association, Rozen Kreuz. It can only be obtained by those who have been recognized by the Association for significant contributions.While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received by 5.

name: L'Horloge D'Reus
effect: A consecrated, higher-order L'horloge.While [Equipped], by spending x1 [Timing: Start], gain +5 [Magical Damage] until [Timing: End].

name: Relic Shard
effect: A special relic that transforms scripture into a weapon.While [Equipped], gain +5 [Damage] to [Style: Divine Talker / Timing: Attack] [Talents].

name: Legendary Mascot
effect: A mascot that survived a legendary battle.While [Equipped], gain +3 to the [Range] of [Magical Attacks] (if [Engaged], it becomes [3 Sq.], if [Charge 1 Sq.] it becomes [Charge 4 Sq.], etc).

name: Ultimate Magic Creature
effect: The ultimate magical creature, with the ultimate spirit.While [Equipped], twice per combat when making a [Magical Attack], the Target [Halves] their [Barrier].

name: Spirit Furnace
effect: A magical artifact that can circulate and burn spirit energy. Its form varies.While [Equipped], twice per combat when performing a [Magical Attack], gain +1 [Magical Rank].

name: Divine Guardian
effect: A guardian beast or heroic spirit from amongst the strongest class of contract summon.While [Equipped], user may perform [Magical Attacks] after a [Combat Move]. Additionally, once per round, change the [Range] of a [Magical Attack] to [Charge 7 Sq].

name: Otherworld Grimoire
effect: A magic book compiled in another world. It is inscribed with magic that does not exist in the modern era.While [Equipped], once per combat, treat a [Magical Attack] as a [Special Attack] (Core p172).

name: White Khakkhara
effect: A pure white khakkhara staff, representing an innocent heart.While [Equipped], by spending x1 [Timing: End], [Range: 8 Sq. / Target: 1#] may remove one [Negative Shift] other than [Downed, Taken Out, Dead].

name: Diamond Skull
effect: An elaborate skull made of diamonds. Can convert magical power into physical force.While [Equipped], twice per combat, change [Magical Damage] into [Physical Damage].

name: Astral Clock
effect: The world's highest level of mobile artificial regalia, clocked up to the limit. The number of them is extremely small.While [Equipped], twice per session, gain 1 [Overflow].

name: Elder Records
effect: A manuscript written with the wisdom of ancient magicians.While [Equipped], once per round while performing a [Magical Attack], gain +1 [Magical Rank].
